text:
When relying on a business partner
network, you need an easy and automated way

to orchestrate transactions between
your partners and internal applications.

But building and managing electronic data
interchange (EDI) often requires long lead times,

creates unnecessary expenses, and
ultimately results in data silos.
Introducing AWS B2B Data Interchange,

a new and fully managed service
helping you to easily exchange

EDI-based transactions with your
business trading partners at scale.

With B2B Data Interchange, you can invite your
business partners to integrate and transact

using EDI formats over industry-standard
protocols within minutes.
B2B Data Interchange automatically parses,

validates, and transforms data
into readily usable formats
such as JSON, XML, and X12,

streamlining the integration between your
EDI documents, applications, and data lakes.

Whether operating your business in supply
chain, healthcare, financial services, or more,

B2B Data Interchange enables you to transact with
your business partners using industry standards.

B2B Data Interchange is a pay-as-you-go
service that automates the exchange

and transformation of EDI documents
between you and your business partners.

B2B Data Interchange removes the 
time, complexity, and costs incurred
to build and manage EDI-based workflows,

helping you focus on using the 
transacted data to gain insights.
Get started today with AWS B2B Data Interchange.
